backend: Understand SQL and relational databases like PostgreSQL
Study how APIs and RESTful systems work
frontend: Get familiar with responsive design and accessibility
Choose a frontend framework (React, Vue, etc.)
Learn animation and transitions in CSS/JS
security: Learn networking fundamentals and OS internals
Master Linux command line and scripting
Explore web hacking (XSS, SQLi, CSRF, etc.)
Use tools like Burp Suite, Nmap, Wireshark
Practice on HackTheBox, TryHackMe, CTF platforms
Study reverse engineering and binary exploitation
Dive into smart contract auditing if interested in Web3
